Target creature you control gets +X/+X until end of turn. Then it fights up to one target creature you don't control. If this spell was cast for its helvete cost, X is the sacrificed creature's power.
Helvete {3}{G} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard by sacrificing a creature and paying its helvete cost reduced by that creature's power. Then exile it.)[/i]
